availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William T. Pratt (Allen County, Indiana, sheriff)

body.p: Allen County, Indiana, sheriff. Maryland native. Married to Elizabeth Aveline Pratt in Miami County, Indiana. Father of Joseph B. Pratt and Mary M. Pratt. Clerk in Allen County, Indiana, in 1850. Assistant U.S. Marshall in Allen County in 1860. Sheriff of Allen County from 1862 to 1866.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Indiana, Allen County, Fort Wayne, p. 104B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Indiana, Allen County, Fort Wayne, p. 987.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Indiana, Allen County, Fort Wayne Ward 3, p. 301B.
"Death of W.T. Pratt," The Fort Wayne Sentinel (Fort Wayne, IN), December 13, 1890, p. 4.
